text: Aramits is a commune of the Pyrénées-Atlantiques département in the region of Nouvelle-Aquitaine, in southwestern France. The people living in Aramits are called Aramitsiens or Aramitsiennes.Inhabitants of Pyrénées-Atlantiques Brigitte Jobbé-Duval, Dictionary of place names - Pyrénées-Atlantiques, 2009, Archives and Culture, At the 2009 Census, the commune had a population of 677. == References == Aramits
title: Aramits
